backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a tic-tac-toe backend with game state logic including win detection, tie detection, and score counting. Exposes an `updateGameState` function that returns a `Features` record with field state, player characters, and points.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the 'hide timer toggle' fix (keeping timer state intact when toggling visibility) to `frontend/src/App.tsx` with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a pre-built reference for the project's frontend architecture and file purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, sidebar, chart, and destructive color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the TickTaskTime app, loading the Quicksand font from Google Fonts and mounting the React app via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that keeps all timer components always mounted using CSS `hidden` class (not conditional rendering) to prevent timer resets on visibility toggle, and wires together background, music, routing, alerts, and sound providers.
frontend/src/branding.ts: Single-export module providing the `APP_NAME` constant ('TickTaskTime') as the app's branding source of truth.
frontend/src/features/alerts/alertSounds: Defines alert sound options (off, beep, chime, bell, custom) and provides a `playAlertSound` utility that safely plays built-in Web Audio API tones or custom/YouTube URLs without throwing errors.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlertS: Settings UI card for timer alerts, allowing users to enable/disable alerts, select a completion sound (built-in or custom), and preview the selected sound.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlerts: React context provider managing timer alert state (enabled flag, selected sound) with localStorage persistence, and exposing `notifyCompletion` and `previewSound` callbacks that play audio and show toast notifications.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: React component that renders a UI for setting the app background via file upload, direct URL, or YouTube URL, with controls for brightness, volume, and timer overlay toggle.
Floating button component that toggles browser fullscreen mode on the background stage element, only rendered when an active background exists.
Floating play/pause button rendered only when a video or YouTube background is active and not in fullscreen, delegating toggle logic to the background context.
React context provider that wraps the `useBackground` hook, exposes background state and actions to child components, and handles blob URL cleanup on background changes.
Renders the active background (image, video, or YouTube) as a full-screen stage, managing play/pause via context state, spacebar keyboard shortcut, and error handling for each media type.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/loadYo: Loads the YouTube IFrame Player API script once and returns a shared promise that resolves when the API is ready. Also declares global TypeScript types for the YT player interface.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Provides utility functions for inferring media type from MIME types or URLs, validating URLs, generating error messages, and probing whether a URL loads as an image or video.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Custom React hook that manages background state (image, video, or YouTube) with localStorage persistence, boot-time validation of persisted backgrounds, and controls for brightness, volume, and playback.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/YouTub: Memoized component that loads the YouTube IFrame API and creates a looping, cover-fitted YouTube player for use as a background, responding to external `isPlaying` and `volume` props.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses various YouTube URL formats to extract video IDs and builds optimized YouTube embed URLs with autoplay and loop parameters for background playback.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: React context provider that wraps the useMusic hook and exposes music state and controls (source, volume, playback error, etc.) to child components via useMusicContext.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI component for configuring music playback, allowing users to input a Spotify, Apple Music, or direct audio URL and adjust volume via a slider.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Renders the appropriate audio output element—a hidden audio tag for direct audio, or off-screen iframes for Spotify and Apple Music embeds—and manages direct audio playback lifecycle.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses music URLs to classify them as Spotify, Apple Music, direct audio, or unknown, and converts share links into embeddable URLs for each supported service.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: Custom React hook that manages music playback state (source URL, type, embed URL, volume) with localStorage persistence and an audio element ref for direct audio control.
frontend/src/features/navigation/Navigat: Settings UI component that displays instructions for drag-to-reorder navigation tabs and provides a button to reset the tab order to default.
frontend/src/features/navigation/navigat: Defines the NavigationTabId type, tab definitions, default order array, and a helper to get a tab's label by ID.
frontend/src/features/navigation/Reorder: Navigation tab bar component that supports pointer-based drag-and-drop reordering via a grip handle, updating tab order on drop.
frontend/src/features/navigation/useNavi: Custom hook that loads, persists, and normalizes the navigation tab order from localStorage, with a reset function to restore the default order.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: Sheet component that displays the current URL for sharing, with copy-to-clipboard and open-in-new-tab actions, and a warning when running inside an embedded preview iframe.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Hook that detects whether the app is running inside an iframe by comparing window.self to window.top, returning a boolean.
frontend/src/features/reminders/Reminder: Headless component that polls reminders every 10 seconds and triggers a notification via the alerts system when a reminder's due date has passed.
UI component for managing reminders, providing dialogs to add and edit reminders with a title and datetime, and displaying them sorted by due date with delete and edit actions.
frontend/src/features/reminders/useRemin: Custom hook that manages a list of reminders in localStorage, exposing add, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/features/sounds/CustomSound: React context provider that manages custom sounds state, persisting to localStorage and exposing methods to add (via URL or file upload), update, remove, reorder, and preview sounds.
frontend/src/features/sounds/customSound: Utility module for persisting custom sounds to localStorage with size/count validation, and helpers for generating IDs, converting files to data URLs, and validating audio file types.
frontend/src/features/sounds/SoundCustom: UI panel component for managing custom sounds, supporting add/edit/delete via URL or file upload, drag-and-drop reordering, and preview playback.
frontend/src/features/sounds/useSoundPan: Custom hook that persists and toggles the sound panel's visibility state in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/sounds/youtubeSoun: Module that plays audio from YouTube URLs using the IFrame API in a hidden player, with auto-stop after a configurable duration and full cleanup on stop.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: Countdown timer card component with editable hours/minutes/seconds inputs, play/pause/reset controls, and completion notification via TimerAlertsProvider.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Custom hook managing countdown timer state (duration, time left, running status) with accurate interval ticking, pause/resume support, localStorage persistence of duration, and an onComplete callback.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: React component rendering an interval timer card with work/rest display, play/pause/reset/skip controls, and configurable settings for interval durations and rounds.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Custom hook managing interval timer state (work/rest intervals, rounds, countdown) with localStorage persistence, accurate tick logic, and start/pause/reset/skip controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/navigation/: React component providing drag-and-drop reorderable timer navigation tabs using pointer events, with visual offset animations during dragging.
Defines the list of available timer modes with their IDs and labels, the default tab order, and a helper to look up a mode's label by ID.
Small settings UI component that displays instructions for reordering timer tabs and provides a button to reset the tab order to default.
Custom hook that loads, persists, and normalizes the timer tab order from localStorage, with deduplication and missing-mode backfill logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: React component rendering a Pomodoro timer card with segment display, play/pause/reset/skip controls, and configurable work, short break, and long break durations.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Custom hook managing Pomodoro timer state including work/break segments, completed pomodoro count, settings persistence in localStorage, and accurate countdown with skip logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: React component rendering a repeating timer card with play/pause/reset controls, a time display, completed repeat count, and settings for duration and repeat count (including infinite mode).
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Custom hook managing repeating timer state (countdown, repeat cycles, infinite mode) with localStorage persistence, accurate interval ticking, and start/pause/reset controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Anim: SVG component that renders two animated concentric arc rings representing seconds (outer) and minutes (inner) progress, with tick marks and a moving dot indicator.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Edit: Controlled numeric text input component that allows direct editing, clamps values to min/max on blur, and syncs with external value changes when not focused.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Minu: Composite input component that splits a total-seconds value into separate minutes and seconds EditableNumberInput fields, recombining them on change.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Rota: Draggable rotary dial component that maps pointer/touch drag rotation to a numeric value within a min/max range, displaying the current value with a rotating indicator dot.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions for formatting a total-seconds value into HH:MM:SS or MM:SS strings, and milliseconds into a similar format with centisecond precision.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: Custom hook that sets up a setInterval with a stable callback ref, running only when the `running` flag is true and cleaning up on stop or unmount.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: React component rendering a stopwatch UI card with start/pause, reset, and lap recording controls, displaying elapsed time and a scrollable lap history.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Custom hook managing stopwatch state (elapsed time, running status, laps) with start, pause, reset, and lap recording logic using an accurate interval.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: Fixed bottom toolbar component showing a wall clock and toggle controls for timer visibility, music, alerts, and settings/share dialogs.
Fixed top-left clock display that shows the current time and hides itself when an active background (image, video, or YouTube) is set.
Custom hook managing timer and toggle visibility state with localStorage/sessionStorage persistence, and auto-hiding the timer when a background becomes active.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens) and utility classes for drag animations and drop targets.
frontend/src/lib/safeStorage.ts: Utility module wrapping localStorage and sessionStorage with error handling and an in-memory fallback for restricted environments like iframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom theme tokens (colors via oklch CSS variables, fonts, border radius, box shadow, animations), and plugins for animation and typography.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking version, existing features, and a known issue where clicking the 'hide timer' toggle incorrectly restarts the timer instead of only hiding its visual display.
